prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
Police have deployed an armoured vehicle to pry open the cabin of a lorry on a motorway in Texas.

The driver refused to stop, or get out of the cab when officers used spike strips to stop the vehicle, police said.

After the armoured vehicle tore open a window, police threw in a gas canister, before going inside and pulling the driver out.

It is unclear what started the chase, but police said the driver used "evasive manoeuvres", changing lanes multiple times and swerving.

“We still don’t know why he was acting in the erratic manner that he was,” Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez told journalists, adding that he appeared to have "some heavy impairment".
stories:
Law enforcement in Texas has utilized an armored vehicle to forcibly gain access to a truck's cabin on a motorway, after the driver failed to comply with police instructions.

When officers attempted to halt the vehicle using spike strips, the driver refused to stop or exit the cab, according to authorities.

Following the armored vehicle's breach of a window, police deployed a gas canister before entering the cabin and extracting the driver.

The circumstances that initiated the pursuit remain unclear, but authorities reported that the driver employed "evasive tactics", repeatedly changing lanes and swerving.

Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez stated that the driver's motives for behaving erratically are still unknown, noting that the individual appeared to be significantly impaired.

Texas law enforcement resorted to using an armored vehicle to break into a truck's cabin on a highway after the driver disregarded police orders. 

When police attempted to stop the vehicle with spike strips, the driver refused to pull over or exit the truck, authorities said. 

After the armored vehicle smashed a window, police fired a gas canister before entering the cabin and removing the driver. 

The reason behind the pursuit remains unclear, but authorities reported that the driver used "evasive maneuvers", constantly switching lanes and swerving. 

Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez said the driver's motivations for erratic behavior are still unknown, adding that the individual seemed severely impaired.

When the driver disregarded attempts to immobilize the vehicle by deflating its tires, authorities escalated their efforts to regain control of the situation.

The armored vehicle broke a window and released a tear gas canister, enabling officers to enter the cab and take the driver into custody.

The specifics of the chase remain unclear, but authorities have verified that the driver displayed "erratic behavior," characterized by sudden and unpredictable lane changes.

Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez stated that the motivations behind the driver's reckless behavior are still unknown, leading authorities to suspect that the individual may have been severely impaired by drugs or a combination of substances.
